ОАХПА!
is not a full training course, but a set of auxiliary programs for language studying. The programs have many choices and can be adapted to different levels of knowledge among the pupils. We have created a small introduction to each program:

ul.li: Numra - choose a set of numerals, the moments of time or date for exercises
Leksa - Translate words, place names or person names

body.p: Our purpose: We want to make it possible for the pupils to train a vocabulary, which is useful for training at a beginners' level.
Oahpa-programs are in a developmental stage and may contain errors. We work on improvement them. If you have comments or criticism, please, write to us: oahpa@uit.no
